name: Mario Breakout
description:
Description

In the game, a layer of coins lines the top portion of the screen. A ball travels up from the bottom of the screen, bouncing off the top and side walls. When a coin is hit, the ball bounces away and the coin is destroyed. The player loses a turn when the ball touches the bottom of the screen. To prevent this from happening, the player has to move Mario using the arrow keys and bounce the ball upward, keeping it in play. To launch the ball press the space bar.
